modernize-use-using.description:
Description

The check converts the usage of
typedef
with
using
keyword.

Before:

typedef
int
variable
;
class
Class
{};
typedef
void
(
Class
::*
MyPtrType
)()
const
;
typedef
struct
{
int
a
;
}
R_t
,
*
R_p
;

After:

using
variable
=
int
;
class
Class
{};
using
MyPtrType
=
void
(
Class
::*
)()
const
;
using
R_t
=
struct
{
int
a
;
};
using
R_p
=
R_t
*
;

The checker ignores
typedef
within
extern “C” { … }
blocks.

extern
"C"
{
typedef
int
InExternC
;
// Left intact.
}

This check requires using C++11 or higher to run.
modernize-use-using.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
IgnoreMacros
If set to
true
, the check will not give warnings inside macros. Default
is
true
.
IgnoreExternC
If set to
true
, the check will not give warning inside
extern
"C"
scope. Default is
false
